org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.resourceadapters11.api

Interface ConnectionDefinitionType<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.Child<T>

    public interface ConnectionDefinitionType<T>
extends org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.Child<T>
    This interface defines the contract for the connection-definitionType xsd type

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Type Property and Description
      ConfigPropertyType<ConnectionDefinitionType<T>> createConfig
      Creates a new config-property element
      ConnectionDefinitionType<T> removeAllConfig
      Removes all config-property elements
